page.title: 05The Harpenden Trust
page.content:
The Harpenden Trust has been going for thirty seven years. It gives people advice, help, food, money and coal. The Trust was started by Lord Hill of Luton and Mr Ackroyd, a local baker in 1948.
Every year the Trust has a collection. The first time they had a collection they raised Â£20 last year(1984) the Trust raised Â£2,000.
At Christmas the Trust gives food parcels to people who have not much money. Also at Christmas some Trust people stay with lonely people who have no friends or relatives.
The Harpenden Trust is a community service and aims to help people in need.
